name: Undead Battle: Zombie Invasion!
description:
Run!!! Zombies are attacking! There are dead people everywhere! Smash their heads in before they kill you too!

Run, Jump and Bash your way across rooftops in this EPIC fast paced addictive action runner in a city invaded by zombies!

Now with multiplayer survival tournaments - compete against other humans trying to survive zombie city.

FEATURES ++
- Single player & Multiplayer modes
- Awesome HD graphics based on 3D models!
- Smooth tap & swipe controls
- Fast paced zombie bashing action
- You control the game speed! Swipe forward to make it even faster!
